parameters.name: Override
parameters.description: True to override the paths and filenames of the documents set by IPackAndGo::SetDocumentSaveToNames or IPackAndGo::ISetDocumentSaveToNames , false to not

parameters.name: SaveToName
parameters.description: Path or the path and filename of the Zip file to use to override the paths and filenames of the documents set by IPackAndGo::SetDocumentSaveToNames or IPackAndGo::ISetDocumentSaveToNames

title: IPackAndGo.SetSaveToName2
description: Overrides the paths and filenames of the documents set by IPackAndGo::SetDocumentSaveToNames or IPackAndGo::ISetDocumentSaveToNames with the specified path or the path and name of the Zip file.
signature:
System.Boolean SetSaveToName2( 
   System.Boolean
Override
,
   System.String
SaveToName
)

parameters.name: Override
parameters.description: True to override the paths and filenames of the documents set by IPackAndGo::SetDocumentSaveToNames or IPackAndGo::ISetDocumentSaveToNames , false to not

parameters.name: SaveToName
parameters.description: Path or the path and filename of the Zip file to use to override the paths and filenames of the documents set by IPackAndGo::SetDocumentSaveToNames or IPackAndGo::ISetDocumentSaveToNames

returns: True if the paths and filenames of the documents set by IPackAndGo::SetDocumentSaveToNames or IPackAndGo::ISetDocumentSaveToNames are overridden, false if not
remarks:
The difference between this method and the now obsolete IPackAndGo::SetSaveToName is that this method supports saving to minimal folders. It saves to any folder structure as defined by
IPackAndGo::FolderStructureOption
.
